attributes.action: impose a trade, finance and arms embargo against South Africa until such time that South Africa imposes total sanctions against Zimbabwe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
South Africa is the key to toppling the murderous house of cards that is Robert Mugabe's dictatorship.
  Without trade from South Africa, without finance from its banks, without arms, Mugabe would surely fall.   
 South Africa's President Thabo Mbeki has refused to even criticise Robert Mugabe but the ruling ANC and trade unions have urged him to take a stronger line.
   Britain would never impose an embargo on South Africa but if enough people sign this petition, perhaps South Africa might take notice.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
